microprocessor_definition.name: Battery display
microprocessor_definition.description: Displays a battery's value on a monitor

node.label: Battery
node.description: The output from a battery (0-1)

node.label: Video passtrough
node.description: A passtrough signal for BG video

object.script:
function onTick() batin = input.getNumber(1) xof = property.getNumber("x offset") yof = property.getNumber("y offset") battp = batin * 100 end
function onDraw() screen.setColor(0,0,0) screen.drawClear() screen.setColor(255,255,255) w = screen.getWidth() h = screen.getHeight() screen.drawLine(7+xof,10+yof,7+xof,28+yof) screen.drawLine(24+xof,10+yof,24+xof,28+yof) screen.drawLine(7+xof,28+yof,25+xof,28+yof) screen.drawLine(8+xof,10+yof,12+xof,10+yof) screen.drawLine(20+xof,10+yof,25+xof,10+yof) screen.drawLine(12+xof,10+yof,12+xof,8+yof) screen.drawLine(19+xof,10+yof,19+xof,8+yof) screen.drawLine(12+xof,8+yof,20+xof,8+yof)
if battp < 10 then screen.setColor(255,17,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,25+yof,13,1) else if battp < 30 then screen.setColor(255,17,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,25+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(255,111,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,22+yof,13,1) else if battp < 50 then screen.setColor(255,17,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,25+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(255,111,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,22+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(255,238,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,19+yof,13,1) else if battp < 70 then screen.setColor(255,17,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,25+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(255,111,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,22+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(255,238,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,19+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(0,200,255) screen.drawRect(9+xof,16+yof,13,1) else if battp < 90 then screen.setColor(255,17,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,25+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(255,111,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,22+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(255,238,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,19+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(0,200,255) screen.drawRect(9+xof,16+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(34, 255, 0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,13+yof,13,1) else screen.setColor(255,17,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,25+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(255,111,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,22+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(255,238,0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,19+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(0,200,255) screen.drawRect(9+xof,16+yof,13,1) screen.setColor(34, 255, 0) screen.drawRect(9+xof,13+yof,13,1) end end end end end end

object.script:
Recommending Settings
Monitor/HUD Size = 1x1 1x2 1x3 2x2 2x3 3x3 ========================================================================== Scale Factor = 25 25 25 50 50 100 Pitch Scale Int. = 15 15 15 10 10 10 Compass Scale Int. = xx xx xx 20 20 10 Ladder Scaling = Large Small Small Small Small Small Vertical Velocity = Optional Optional Optional Optional Optional Optional Velocity Vector = Optional Optional Optional Optional Optional Optional
Pitch Ladder Label = off off Optional off Optional Optional Compass Label = off Optional Optional Optional Optional Optional Compass Scale = off off off Optional Optional Optional Speed Label = off Optional Optional Optional Optional Optional Speed Scale = off off off Optional Optional Optional Altitude Label = off Optional Optional Optional Optional Optional Altitude Scale = off off off Optional Optional Optional

vvSiz=2 pi=math.pi pi2=2*pi inN=input.getNumber inB=input.getBool s=math.sin c=math.cos t=math.tan at=math.atan abs=math.abs min=math.min drawT=screen.drawText drawL=screen.drawLine drawR=screen.drawRect drawRF=screen.drawRectF setC=screen.setColor form=string.format function sgn(x) if x==0 then return 0 else return x/abs(x) end end function devAng(q,q0,qt,cw) return -cw*(q-q0+(1-qt))%1-(1-qt) end function rotV2Z(x,y,qz) qz=qz*pi2 return x*c(qz)-y*s(qz),x*s(qz)+y*c(qz) end function updnText(x,posX,posY,xRange,xPitch,xScale,scale,label,LimU,LimB) posY=math.floor((LimB-LimU)/2+posY) if label then drawT(posX,posY-2,form("%3.0f",x)) drawR(posX-2,posY-4, 17, 8) end if scale then for i=0,math.floor(xRange/(xPitch/xScale)) do xmod=x%xPitch xint=i*xPitch if (xmod-xint)*xScale<-7 and (xmod-xint)*xScale>-LimU then drawT(posX,posY+(xmod-xint)*xScale,form("%3.0f",x-xmod+xint)) end if (xmod+xint)*xScale>5 and (xmod+xint)*xScale<LimB then drawT(posX,posY+(xmod+xint)*xScale,form("%3.0f",x-xmod-xint)) end end end end
function onTick() altunit=inN(11) alt=inN(1)*altunit Vunit=inN(12) dirV=inN(2)*Vunit horV=inN(3)*Vunit verV=inN(4)*Vunit rol0=inN(5) pit0=inN(6) vtilt=inN(7) rol=rol0-min(0,sgn(vtilt))*(sgn(rol0)*0.5-2*rol0) pit=math.asin(s(pit0*pi2)/c(rol*pi2))/pi2 comp=devAng(inN(8),0,1,1) dAlt=inN(9)*altunit --qx,qz=as(s(qx)/c(qy)) r=inN(13) ladSc=inN(14) cOpt=inN(15) style=inN(16) compInt=inN(18) dNumC=math.floor(360/compInt) ss=inB(3) sl=inB(4) as=inB(5) al=inB(6) cs=inB(7) cl=inB(8) vv=inB(9) ll=inB(10) vvel=inB(11) absV=(dirV^2+horV^2+verV^2)^0.5 end
function onDraw() w=screen.getWidth() h=screen.getHeight()
if cs then sideDy=-11 else sideDy=0 end sideLimB=h/2+sideDy if vvel then altDx=-18 else altDx=-16 end altx=w+altDx
if style==0 then -- setC(0,0,0,255) -- screen.drawClear() else setC(60,20,10) screen.drawClear() setC(30,30,255) hP=r*t(-pit*pi2) mR=t(rol*pi2) pux,puy=w/2+(-hP+h/2)/mR,0 pdx,pdy=w/2+(-hP-h/2)/mR,h
if vtilt>0 then ptx,pty=pdx,puy else ptx,pty=pux,pdy end qux,quy=pdx-sgn(rol)*w,puy qdx,qdy=pdx-sgn(rol)*w,pdy screen.drawTriangleF(pux,puy,pdx,pdy,ptx,pty) if rol>0 then if vtilt>0 then drawRF(0,0,pdx,h) else drawRF(0,0,pux,h) end else if vtilt>0 then drawRF(pdx,0,w-pdx,h) else drawRF(pux,0,w-pux,h) end end end
if cOpt == 0 or cOpt == 1 then setC(0, 255, 0) elseif cOpt == 2 then setC(63,63,63) end screen.drawCircleF(w/2,h/2,1) for i=-1,1,2 do drawL(w/2+i*w*ladSc*vvSiz/6,h/2,w/2+3*i*w*ladSc*vvSiz/6,h/2) drawL(w/2+i*w*ladSc*vvSiz/6,h/2,w/2+i*w*ladSc*vvSiz/6,h/2+h*ladSc*vvSiz/6) end
setC(0,0,0,127) if sl then drawRF(0,h/2+sideDy/2-4,17,8) end if al then drawRF(altx-2,h/2+sideDy/2-4,17,8) end if cl then drawRF(w/2-8,h-9,17,8) end
--compass if cOpt == 0 then setC(0, 255, 0) elseif cOpt == 1 then setC(255, 0, 0) elseif cOpt == 2 then setC(255, 255, 255) end if cl then drawT(w/2-6,h-7,form("%3.0f",comp*360)) drawR(w/2-8,h-9, 17, 8) if cs then drawL(w/2,h-9,w/2,h-17) end end if cs then for i=0,dNumC-1 do angYaw = devAng(i*compInt/360,comp,0.5,-1) if abs(angYaw)<at(w/1.5/r)/pi2 then drawL(w/2+r*t(angYaw*pi2), h-11, w/2+r*t(angYaw*pi2), h-17) if cl then cRange=at(11/r)/pi2 else cRange=0 end if abs(angYaw)>cRange then drawT(w/2+r*t(angYaw*pi2)-4,h-7,form("%2.0f",i*compInt/10)) end end end end
--velocity updnText(absV,2,h/2,20,5,2.5,ss,sl,h/2,sideLimB) --altitude updnText(alt,altx,h/2,20,5,2.5,as,al,h/2,sideLimB) --vertical speed if vvel then if dAlt<0 then vvelx=w-2 else vvelx=w-1 end drawRF(vvelx,(sideLimB-h/2)/2+h/2,2,-dAlt*h/1) end end

object.script:
waypointX = 0 waypointY = 0
isLockedOn = true showLine = false zoom = 1
worldX = 0 worldY = 0
function clamp(inp, min, max) if inp > max then return max elseif inp < min then return min else return inp end end function onTick() zoom = zoom
worldX = worldX worldY = worldY
waypointX = waypointX waypointY = waypointY
isLockedOn = isLockedOn showLine = showLine
inputX = input.getNumber(3) inputY = input.getNumber(4) isPressed = input.getBool(1)
isPressingZoom = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, w - 8, 1, 5, 28) isPressingWP = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, w-8, 29, 9, 9) isPressingReturn = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, w-8, 38, 9, 9) isPressingLine = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, w-8, 47, 9, 9) output.setBool(2, isPressingZoom) isPressingZoom = input.getBool(2) or isPressingZoom
X = input.getNumber(5) Y = input.getNumber(6)
wpX = ((X-worldX)/(15.2*zoom))+32 wpY = ((worldY-Y)/(15.2*zoom))+32
cwpX = clamp(wpX, 0, 63) cwpY = clamp(wpY, 0, 63)
if isLockedOn or isPressingReturn then worldX = X worldY = Y isLockedOn = true end
if isPressingZoom then zoom = 2 - ((inputY - 5) / 20) end
if isPressed and not isPressingZoom and not isPressingWP and not isPressingReturn and not isPressingLine then worldX = worldX + ((inputX/32 - 1)*(10*zoom)) worldY = worldY - ((inputY/32 - 1)*(10*zoom)) isLockedOn = false end
output.setBool(3, isPressingLine) isPressingLine = input.getBool(3) output.setNumber(7, zoom) zoom = input.getNumber(7) z = input.getNumber(8) threshold = input.getNumber(9)
if cwpX < 6 and cwpY < 6 then cwpY = 6 - cwpX cwpX = 6 - cwpY elseif cwpX < 6 and cwpY > 60 then cwpY = 60 + cwpX cwpX = cwpY - 60 elseif cwpX > 58 and cwpY < 6 then cwpY = cwpX - 58 cwpX = 58 + cwpY elseif cwpX > 58 and cwpY > 58 then cwpY = 122 - cwpX cwpX = 122 - cwpY end
if isPressingWP then waypointX = worldX waypointY = worldY end
if isPressingLine then showLine = not showLine end
waypointposX = ((waypointX-worldX)/(15.2*zoom))+32 waypointposY = ((worldY-waypointY)/(15.2*zoom))+32
cwaypointposX = clamp(waypointposX, 0, 63) cwaypointposY = clamp(waypointposY, 0, 63)
end
function isPointInRectangle(x, y, rectX, rectY, rectW, rectH) return x > rectX and y > rectY and x < rectX+rectW and y < rectY+rectH end
function onDraw() w = screen.getWidth() h = screen.getHeight() screen.setColor(0, 255, 0)
screen.drawMap(worldX, worldY, zoom)
screen.drawRectF(w - 8, 5 + (20 - (zoom - 1)*20), 5, (zoom - 1)*20)
screen.setColor(100, 100, 100) screen.drawRectF(w - 6, 5, 1, 20)
screen.setColor(255, 255, 255) screen.drawRectF(w - 8, 5 + ((2 - zoom)*20), 5, 1)
if z == 1 then screen.drawText(w - 25, 3 + ((2 - zoom)*20), string.format("%.1f", zoom)) end
inThreshold = waypointX > (X - threshold) and waypointX < (X + threshold) and waypointY > (Y - threshold) and waypointY < (Y + threshold)
if not inThreshold then screen.setColor(255, 0, 0) screen.drawRectF(cwaypointposX, cwaypointposY, 1, 1) end
screen.drawText(10, 10, inThreshold)
screen.setColor(255, 255, 255) screen.drawRectF(w/2-1, h/2, 3, 1) screen.drawRectF(w/2, h/2-1, 1, 3)
if isPressingWP then screen.setColor(69, 69, 69) screen.drawText(w-7, 32, "W")
else screen.setColor(255, 0, 0) screen.drawText(w-7, 32, "W") end
screen.setColor(255, 255, 255) screen.drawRect(w-9, 30, 7, 7)
if isPressingReturn then screen.setColor(69, 69, 69) screen.drawText(w-7, 41, "R") else screen.setColor(255, 0, 0) screen.drawText(w-7, 41, "R") end
screen.setColor(255, 255, 255) screen.drawRect(w-9, 39, 7, 7)
if showLine then screen.setColor(69, 69, 69) screen.drawText(w-7, 50, "L")
screen.setColor(255, 0, 0) screen.drawLine(wpX, wpY, waypointposX, waypointposY) else screen.setColor(255, 0, 0) screen.drawText(w-7, 50, "L") end
screen.setColor(255, 255, 255) screen.drawRect(w-9, 48, 7, 7)
end

microprocessor_definition.description: Mount the HUD 2 blocks from the seat!

node.description: The input signal to be processed.

node.label: forward radar
node.description: The input signal to be processed.

object.script:
--default values xold1 = 0 yold1 = 0 xold2 = 0 yold2 = 0 xold3 = 0 yold3 = 0 xold4 = 0 yold4 = 0 xold5 = 0 yold5 = 0 xold6 = 0 yold6 = 0 xold7 = 0 yold7 = 0 xold8 = 0 yold8 = 0 xold9 = 0 yold9 = 0 xnew = 0 ynew = 0 targnum = 0
--code aliases for minimizing the script igb = input.getBool ign = input.getNumber ssc = screen.setColor sdr = screen.drawRect sdt = screen.drawText
function onTick()
--get FOV angle xt = (property.getNumber("HUD Field of View"))*(100) yt = -(xt)
--get maximum missile range maxran = property.getNumber("Missile range in KM")
--get jitter reduction setting jitred = property.getBool("Target 1 jitter reduction")
--get target number color setting ttclr = property.getBool("Target number text color")
--get hud tinting setting tint = property.getBool("HUD tint")
--get radar data targ1 = igb(1) targ2 = igb(2) targ3 = igb(3) targ4 = igb(4) targ5 = igb(5) targ6 = igb(6) targ7 = igb(7) targ8 = igb(8) dist = ign(1) x1 = ign(2) y1 = ign(3) x2 = ign(6) y2 = ign(7) x3 = ign(10) y3 = ign(11) x4 = ign(14) y4 = ign(15) x5 = ign(18) y5 = ign(19) x6 = ign(22) y6 = ign(23) x7 = ign(26) y7 = ign(27) x8 = ign(30) y8 = ign(31)
--jitter reduction xnew = (xold1+xold2+xold3+xold4+xold5+xold6+xold7+xold8+xold9+x1)*0.1 ynew = (yold1+yold2+yold3+yold4+yold5+yold6+yold7+yold8+yold9+y1)*0.1 xold9 = xold8 yold9 = yold8 xold8 = xold7 yold8 = yold7 xold7 = xold6 yold7 = yold6 xold6 = xold5 yold6 = yold5 xold5 = xold4 yold5 = yold4 xold4 = xold3 yold4 = yold3 xold3 = xold2 yold3 = yold2 xold2 = xold1 yold2 = yold1 xold1 = x1 yold1 = y1
--convert distance from meters to km, and restrict to 1 decimal place and 9.9km dist = (math.floor(dist/100))/10 if dist > 9.86 then dist = 9.9 end
--convert radar data to screen position x0 = xnew*xt y0 = ynew*yt x1 = x1*xt y1 = y1*yt x2 = x2*xt y2 = y2*yt x3 = x3*xt y3 = y3*yt x4 = x4*xt y4 = y4*yt x5 = x5*xt y5 = y5*yt x6 = x6*xt y6 = y6*yt x7 = x7*xt y7 = y7*yt x8 = x8*xt y8 = y8*yt
end
function onDraw()
--screen tinting if tint == true then ssc(15, 15, 0) screen.drawClear() end
--get screen size w = screen.getWidth() h = screen.getHeight()
--draw center square (green) ssc(0, 255, 0) sdr((w/2)-4, (h/2)-12, 7, 7)
--draw outline square (orange) ssc(255, 128, 0) sdr((w/2)-30, (h/2)-32, 59, 51)
--target number exception for one target (because targ2 is solved before targ1) if targ1 == true then targnum = 1 end
--draw targets 2-8 (orange) screen.setColor(255, 128, 0, 128) if targ2 == true then targnum = 2 sdr((w/2)-3+x2, (h/2)-11+y2, 3, 3) end if targ3 == true then targnum = 3 sdr((w/2)-3+x3, (h/2)-11+y3, 3, 3) end if targ4 == true then targnum = 4 sdr((w/2)-3+x4, (h/2)-11+y4, 3, 3) end if targ5 == true then targnum = 5 sdr((w/2)-3+x5, (h/2)-11+y5, 3, 3) end if targ6 == true then targnum = 6 sdr((w/2)-3+x6, (h/2)-11+y6, 3, 3) end if targ7 == true then targnum = 7 sdr((w/2)-3+x7, (h/2)-11+y7, 3, 3) end if targ8 == true then targnum = 8 sdr((w/2)-3+x8, (h/2)-11+y8, 3, 3) end
--draw target 1 (red) if targ1 == true then ssc(255, 0, 0)
--smooth target (if enabled) if jitred == true then sdr((w/2)-3+x0, (h/2)-11+y0, 5, 5) ssc(255, 0, 0, 128) end
sdr((w/2)-3+x1, (h/2)-11+y1, 5, 5) --accurate target ssc(255, 0, 0) --revert to red
--change distance text to green when within range if dist < maxran then ssc(0, 255, 0) end
--draw target distance text sdt((w/2)+4+x0, (h/2)-10+y0, dist)
--change target number color on setting if ttclr == true then ssc(0, 255, 0) end
--draw target number text sdt((w/2)-22, (h/2)+25, "Targets:") sdt((w/2)+17, (h/2)+25, targnum) end
end

object.script:
gb,gn,pgn,pgb=input.getBool,input.getNumber,property.getNumber,property.getBool sb,sn=output.setBool,output.setNumber sc,dt,drf,dtb,dr=screen.setColor,screen.drawText,screen.drawRectF,screen.drawTextBox,screen.drawRect dc,dl,dcf,dtf=screen.drawCircle,screen.drawLine,screen.drawCircleF,screen.drawTriangleF
_DM=pgn('Default Display Mode')
_RGS = {pgn('Range 1'),pgn('Range 2'),pgn('Range 3'),pgn('Range 4')} -- ranges _RG = pgn('Default Range')
OLD_PRESS=false
READY=false
function onTick() if READY then sb(32,update(gb(1),gn(3),gn(4),gb(2),gn(5),gn(6),gn(1),gn(2))) sb(31, is_on(BUT_S))
if is_on(BUT_R) and not old_is_on(BUT_R) then _RG = (_RG%4)+1 end if is_on(BUT_M) and not old_is_on(BUT_M) then _DM = (_DM+1)%2 end sn(1,_RGS[_RG]) sn(2,_DM) elseif gn(1) > 0 then w,h=gn(1),gn(2) BUTTONS={ -- title,is_toggle,x,y,width,length,is_on,r,g,b,old_is_on {"R",false,0,h-7,5,7,false,15,127,15,false}, {"SCAN",true,12,h-7,17,7,false,15,127,15,false}, {"M",false,6,h-7,5,7,false,15,127,15,false}, }
BUT_R=BUTTONS[1] BUT_S=BUTTONS[2] BUT_M=BUTTONS[3]
BUT_S[7]=pgb('Default On/Off')
READY=true end end
function onDraw() if READY then w = screen.getWidth() h = screen.getHeight() drawButton(BUT_R,w,h) drawButton(BUT_S,w,h) drawButton(BUT_M,w,h) r=_RGS[_RG] m = 'm' if r >= 1000 then r = r / 1000 m = 'km' end sc(191,191,191,255) dst(1, 0,'R:' .. string.format('%d', r//1) .. m) else sc(0,0,255,255) screen.drawClear() sc(255,255,255,255) dst(2,2,"Unknow") dst(2,8,"Display") dst(2,14,"Size.") end end
-- Needed function below
function update(p,x,y,p2,x2,y2,w,h) if not p then p,x,y=p2,x2,y2 end c=p and not OLD_PRESS OLD_PRESS=p buzz=false for k,b in pairs(BUTTONS) do b[11]=b[7] abv = x>b[3] and y>b[4] and x<b[3]+b[5] and y<b[4]+b[6] if b[2] then if c and abv then b[7]=not b[7] buzz=true end else b[7]=p and abv buzz=buzz or b[7] and not b[11] end end return buzz end
function is_on(b) return b[7] end function old_is_on(b) return b[11] end function drawButton(b,w,h) if b[7] then sc(b[8],b[9],b[10]) else sc(15,15,15) end drf(b[3],b[4],b[5]-1,b[6]-1) sc(200,200,200) x,y=b[3]+b[5]//2-len(b[1])//2,b[4]+b[6]//2-2 dst(x,y,b[1]) sc(5,5,5) dr(b[3],b[4],b[5]-1,b[6]-1) end
function fd(c,t)return string.find(t,c,1,true)end function len(t) l=0 for i=1,string.len(t)do if fd(t:sub(i,i),",.!:';")then l=l+2 else l=l+4 end end return l-1 end
-- Init
drf=screen.drawRectF pgt=property.getText
FONT=pgt("FONT1")..pgt("FONT2") FONT_D={} FONT_S=0 for n in FONT:gmatch("....")do FONT_D[FONT_S+1]=tonumber(n,16)FONT_S=FONT_S+1 end function dst(x,y,t,s,r,m)s=s or 1 r=r or 1 if r>2then t=t:reverse()end t=t:upper()for c in t:gmatch(".")do ci=c:byte()-31if 0<ci and ci<=FONT_S then for i=1,15 do if r>2 then p=2^i else p=2^(16-i)end if FONT_D[ci]&p==p then xx,yy=((i-1)%3)*s,((i-1)//3)*s if r%2==1then drf(x+xx,y+yy,s,s)else drf(x+5-yy,y+xx,s,s)end end end if FONT_D[ci]&1==1 and not m then i=2*s else i=4*s end if r%2==1then x=x+i else y=y+i end end end end

gb,gn,pgn,pgb=input.getBool,input.getNumber,property.getNumber,property.getBool sb,sn=output.setBool,output.setNumber sc,dt,drf,dtb,dr=screen.setColor,screen.drawText,screen.drawRectF,screen.drawTextBox,screen.drawRect dc,dl,dcf,dtf=screen.drawCircle,screen.drawLine,screen.drawCircleF,screen.drawTriangleF
_K=pgn("Keep Data For Tick") _A=pgn("Group Target Factor") _DS=pgb("Display Scan") _R=pgn('Display R') _G=pgn('Display G') _B=pgn('Display B') _MY=(pgn("Radar Sweep Limit")+pgn("Radar Horizontal FOV")*0.5)*360 if _MY>180 then _MY=180 end _MP=(pgn("Radar Vertical FOV") * 0.5)*360 _S=pgn("Detection Size")-1 _SM=pgn("Detection Smoothing") _MAP=pgb("Show Map") _RP=pgn("Radar Pitch")*360 _PI=math.pi _INV=1 if pgb("Scan") then _INV = -1 end
offx=0 offy=0
D={} DC=0 SR=0 RA=0 M=0 X=0 Y=0 CPS=0 TILT=0 function onTick() RA=angle(gn(4)*2*_PI*_INV) SR=gn(8) M=gn(12) X=gn(16) Y=gn(20) CPS=-gn(24)*2*_PI TILT=gn(28)*2*_PI
-- fadeout/clear old det for i=1,DC do if D[i].t > 2 then D[i].t=D[i].t-1 else D[i]={d=0,y=0,p=0,t=0} end end
-- save old tick od=D
-- we create the new list D={} DC=0 for i=1,7 do if gb(i) then a=gn(ii(i,2))*2*_PI d=math.cos(TILT)*gn(ii(i,1)) x,y=rotate(d,0,_PI/2-CPS-a) table.insert(D, {d=d,y=angle(a+CPS),p=angle(gn(ii(i,3))*2*_PI+TILT),t=_K,new=true,ft=1,cx=x+X,cy=y+Y}) DC=DC+1 end end
-- we avg with the last tick if the detection still exist for k,o in pairs(od) do if o.t > 0 then fj=-1 -- find closest md=99999999 for j=1,DC do d=math.abs(o.cy-D[j].cy)+math.abs(o.cx-D[j].cx) if d < md and D[j].new and d < _A then fj=j md=d end end if fj>0 then ft=D[fj].ft+o.ft D[fj].d=(D[fj].d*D[fj].ft+o.d*o.ft)/ft D[fj].y=(D[fj].y*D[fj].ft+o.y*o.ft)/ft D[fj].p=(D[fj].p*D[fj].ft+o.p*o.ft)/ft D[fj].new=false if ft > _SM then ft=_SM end D[fj].ft=ft else table.insert(D,o) DC=DC+1 end end end
sn(1,DC) sn(2,SR) sn(3,RA) sn(4,M) end
function onDraw() w = screen.getWidth() h = screen.getHeight() w2,h2=w/2,h/2
-- View Front if M==0 then if _DS then sc(_R,_G,_B,196) x=RA*180*w2/(_MY*math.pi)+w2 dl(x,0,x,h) end for k,o in pairs(D) do x=angle(o.y-CPS)/_PI*180*w2/_MY+w2 y=-angle(o.p-TILT)/_PI*180*h2/_MP+h2+_RP/_MP*h2 sx=math.max(0,1+(1-o.d/SR)*_S*w/96) sy=sx*0.5 a=math.sqrt(o.t/_K)*255 sc(_R,_G,_B,a) drf(x-sx/2,y-sy/2,sx,sy) end -- View Above elseif M==1 then offy = h2*0.9 if _MY > 90 then offy = offy - math.cos((180-_MY)/180*_PI)*h2*0.9 end
cps=0 if _MAP then cps=CPS end offx,offy = rotate(0,-offy * 0.5,cps)
if _MAP then z=SR/0.45 mX,mY=X-offx*z/w,Y+offy*z/h z=z*0.001 screen.drawMap(mX,mY,z) end sc(_R,_G,_B) if _MY < 180 then drl(_MY/180*_PI) drl(-_MY/180*_PI) end dhc(_MY/180*_PI) if _DS then sc(_R,_G,_B,196) drl(RA,w2,h2) end for k,o in pairs(D) do if o.d <= SR then sc(_R,_G,_B,math.sqrt(o.t/_K)*255) if _MAP then drp2(o.cx,o.cy,(angle(o.p-TILT)/_PI+1)*0.5,z) else drp(angle(o.y-CPS),o.d/SR,(o.p+1)*0.5) end end end
end end
function ii(i,j) return (i-1)*4+j end
-- clamp the angle from -pi to pi function angle(a) while a>_PI do a=a-2*_PI end while a<-_PI do a=a+2*_PI end return a end
function dhc(a) inc=a*0.05 cps=0 if _MAP then cps=CPS end ox,oy = rotate(0,h2*0.9,-a+cps) for i=-a+inc,a+0.01,inc do x,y = rotate(0,h2*0.9,i+cps) dl(w2+ox+offx,h2+oy+offy,w2+x+offx,h2+y+offy) ox,oy=x,y end end
function drl(a) cps=0 if _MAP then cps=CPS end x,y = rotate(0,h2*0.9,a+cps) dl(w2+offx,h2+offy,w2+x+offx,h2+y+offy) end
function drp(a,d,p) x,y = rotate(0,d*h2*0.9,a) dcf(w2+x+offx,h2+y+offy,1+p*_S*w2*2/96) end
function drp2(x,y,p,z) x,y=map.mapToScreen(mX,mY,z,w,h,x,y) dcf(x,y,1+p*_S*w2*2/96) end
function rotate(x,y,a) cos = math.cos(a) sin = math.sin(a) return (cos*x+sin*y), (sin*x - cos*y) end

gb,gn,pgn,pgb=input.getBool,input.getNumber,property.getNumber,property.getBool sb,sn=output.setBool,output.setNumber sc,dt,drf,dtb,dr=screen.setColor,screen.drawText,screen.drawRectF,screen.drawTextBox,screen.drawRect dc,dl,dcf,dtf=screen.drawCircle,screen.drawLine,screen.drawCircleF,screen.drawTriangleF
_K=pgn("Keep Data For Tick") _A=pgn("Group Target Factor") _DS=pgb("Display Scan") _R = pgn('HUD R') _G = pgn('HUD G') _B = pgn('HUD B') _MY=(pgn("Radar Sweep Limit")+pgn("Radar Horizontal FOV")*0.5)*360 if _MY>180 then _MY=180 end _MP=(pgn("Radar Vertical FOV") * 0.5)*360 _HUDMY=pgn("HUD Max Yaw") _HUDMP=pgn("HUD Max Pitch") _S=pgn("Detection Size")-1 _SM=pgn("Detection Smoothing") _OFF=pgn("HUD Y Offset") _RP=pgn("Radar Pitch")*360 _PI=math.pi _INV=1 if pgb("Scan") then _INV = -1 end
offset=0
D={} DC=0 SR=0 RA=0 M=0 X=0 Y=0 CPS=0 TILT=0 function onTick() RA=angle(gn(4)*2*_PI*_INV) SR=gn(8) M=gn(12) X=gn(16) Y=gn(20) CPS=-gn(24)*2*_PI TILT=gn(28)*2*_PI
-- fadeout/clear old det for i=1,DC do if D[i].t > 2 then D[i].t=D[i].t-1 else D[i]={d=0,y=0,p=0,t=0} end end
-- save old tick od=D
-- we create the new list D={} DC=0 for i=1,7 do if gb(i) then a=gn(ii(i,2))*2*_PI d=math.cos(TILT)*gn(ii(i,1)) x,y=rotate(d,0,_PI/2-CPS-a) table.insert(D, {d=d,y=angle(a+CPS),p=angle(gn(ii(i,3))*2*_PI+TILT),t=_K,new=true,ft=1,cx=x+X,cy=y+Y}) DC=DC+1 end end
-- we avg with the last tick if the detection still exist for k,o in pairs(od) do if o.t > 0 then fj=-1 -- find closest md=99999999 for j=1,DC do d=math.abs(o.cy-D[j].cy)+math.abs(o.cx-D[j].cx) if d < md and D[j].new and d < _A then fj=j md=d end end if fj>0 then ft=D[fj].ft+o.ft D[fj].d=(D[fj].d*D[fj].ft+o.d*o.ft)/ft D[fj].y=(D[fj].y*D[fj].ft+o.y*o.ft)/ft D[fj].p=(D[fj].p*D[fj].ft+o.p*o.ft)/ft D[fj].new=false if ft > _SM then ft=_SM end D[fj].ft=ft else table.insert(D,o) DC=DC+1 end end end
sn(1,DC) sn(2,SR) sn(3,RA) sn(4,M) end
function onDraw() w = screen.getWidth() h = screen.getHeight() w2,h2=w/2,h/2
-- View Front if M==0 then if _DS then sc(_R,_G,_B,196) x=RA*180*w2/(_MY*math.pi)+w2 y=_MP*h2/_HUDMP sy=_RP/_HUDMP*h2 dl(x,h2-y-sy,x,h2+y-sy) end
f=true for k,o in pairs(D) do x=angle(o.y-CPS)/_PI*180*w2/_HUDMY+w2 y=-angle(o.p-TILT)/_PI*180*h2/_HUDMP+h2+_RP/_MP*h2+_OFF sx=math.max(0,1+(1-o.d/SR)*_S*w/96) sy=sx*0.5 a=math.sqrt(o.t/_K)*255 sc(_R,_G,_B,a) if f then f=false dr(x-5,y-5,10,10) t="%.0fm" d=o.d if d > 1000 then d=d/1000 t="%.0fkm" end dt(x-5,y+8,string.format(t,d)) else drf(x-sx/2,y-sy/2,sx,sy) end end
-- View Above elseif M==1 then offset = h2*0.9 if _MY > 90 then offset = offset - math.cos((180-_MY)/180*_PI)*h2*0.9 end offset = offset * 0.5
sc(_R,_G,_B) if _MY < 180 then drl(_MY/180*_PI) drl(-_MY/180*_PI) end dhc(_MY/180*_PI) if _DS then sc(_R,_G,_B,196) drl(RA) end for k,o in pairs(D) do if o.d <= SR then sc(_R,_G,_B,math.sqrt(o.t/_K)*255) drp(angle(o.y-CPS),o.d/SR,(o.p+1)*0.5) end end
end end
function ii(i,j) return (i-1)*4+j end
-- clamp the angle from -pi to pi function angle(a) while a>_PI do a=a-2*_PI end while a<-_PI do a=a+2*_PI end return a end
function dhc(a) inc=a*0.05 ox,oy = rotate(0,h2*0.9,-a) for i=-a+inc,a+0.01,inc do x,y = rotate(0,h2*0.9,i) dl(w2+ox,h2+oy+offset,w2+x,h2+y+offset) ox,oy=x,y end end
function drl(a) x,y = rotate(0,h2*0.9,a) dl(w2,h2+offset,w2+x,h2+y+offset) end
function drp(a,d,p) x,y = rotate(0,d*h2*0.9,a) dcf(w2+x,h2+y+offset,1+p*_S*w2*2/96) end
function rotate(x,y,a) cos = math.cos(a) sin = math.sin(a) return (cos*x+sin*y), (sin*x - cos*y) end

microprocessor_definition.name: SSE RWR Controller by Blue Viper
microprocessor_definition.description: Automatically manages chaff-launching & displays if a radar hits you

node.label: Screen Input
node.description: Composite signal from screen

node.label: Screen Output
node.description: Video signal to monitor

node.label: chaff
node.description: To flare launcher

node.label: Radar Detector
node.description: ON/OFF Signal from Radar Detector

node.label: Lock Sound
node.description: To buzzer

node.label: Scan Sound
node.description: To buzzer

node.label: Chaff Launch Sound
node.description: To buzzer

node.label: Manual Chaff Launch Input (Push)
node.description: ON/OFF Signal from Seat, Button, etc.

object.script:
-- Tick function that will be executed every logic tick function onTick() scan= input.getBool(2) lock= input.getBool(3) inputX = input.getNumber(3) inputY = input.getNumber(4) isPressed = input.getBool(1) mute= input.getBool(4) auto= input.getBool(5)
isPressingMute = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, 0, w/2, w, h/4)
isPressingAuto = isPressed and isPointInRectangle(inputX, inputY, 0, w/4*3, w, h/4)
-- Set the composite output, on/off channel 1 output.setBool(1, isPressingMute) output.setBool(2, isPressingAuto) end
function isPointInRectangle(x, y, rectX, rectY, rectW, rectH) return x > rectX and y > rectY and x < rectX+rectW and y < rectY+rectH end
-- Draw function that will be executed when this script renders to a screen function onDraw() w = screen.getWidth() -- Get the screen's width and height h = screen.getHeight() screen.setColor(1, 1, 1) screen.drawLine(0, h / 4, w, h/4) screen.drawLine(0, h/2, w, h/2) screen.drawLine(0, h/4*3,w, h/4*3)
if lock==true then screen.setColor(100, 0, 0) screen.drawRectF(0, 0, w, h/4) screen.setColor(255, 255, 255) screen.drawTextBox(w/5, 2, w, h/4, "lock") else screen.setColor(10, 0, 0) screen.drawRectF(0, 0, w, h/4) screen.setColor(10, 10, 10) screen.drawTextBox(w/5, 2, w, h/4, "lock") end
if scan==true then screen.setColor(0, 100, 0) screen.drawRectF(0, h/4+1, w, h/4-1) screen.setColor(255, 255, 255) screen.drawTextBox(w/5, h/4+2, w, h/4, "scan") else screen.setColor(0, 10, 0) screen.drawRectF(0, h/4+1, w, h/4-1) screen.setColor(10, 10, 10) screen.drawTextBox(w/5, h/4+2, w, h/4, "scan") end
if mute==true then screen.setColor(0, 50, 0) screen.drawRectF(0, h/2+1, w, h/4-1) screen.setColor(0, 5, 0) screen.drawTextBox(w/5, h/2+2, w, h/4, "mute") else screen.setColor(0, 5, 0) screen.drawRectF(0, h/2+1, w, h/4-1) screen.setColor(0, 50, 0) screen.drawTextBox(w/5, h/2+2, w, h/4, "mute") end
if auto==true then screen.setColor(0, 50, 0) screen.drawRectF(0, h/4*3+1, w, h/4-1) screen.setColor(0, 5, 0) screen.drawTextBox(2, h/4*3+2, w, h/4, "manual") else screen.setColor(0, 5, 0) screen.drawRectF(0, h/4*3+1, w, h/4-1) screen.setColor(0, 50, 0) screen.drawTextBox(w/5, h/4*3+2, w, h/4, "auto") end
end
